training_captions: Annular-ring printed monopole with a semicircular parasitic strip above the radiator and a partial ground with a rectangular slot; linear polarization, near-omnidirectional pattern, and ultra-wideband response with a WLAN band-notch.

Microstrip-fed annular ring on FR-4, partial ground on the back and a tuned semicircular annular strip creating a sharp stop band; linear-pol, UWB impedance with stable omni radiation outside the notch.

Compact UWB monopole: annular patch plus semicircular parasitic resonator controls the 5â€“6 GHz rejection while maintaining wideband match from ~3 to >10 GHz; linear polarization with near-azimuthal coverage.
